description:
Kijima Shiki is an Associate Special Class Investigator heavily covered in scars obtained when he was attacked by the ghoul nicknamed Jail. He is a sadistic former Interrogator, willing to push the boundaries in pursuit of his prey.
His Quinque, "Rotten Follow", is a chainsaw powered by a Kakuhou harvested from Jail`s older brother.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Kijima Shiki
